column1: # Shortfin Mako Shark (Isurus oxyrinchus) Growth Data
# Compiled from published literature and ICCAT scientific documents
# - ICCAT CVSP Vol. 74 (2017): Atlantic mako shark stock assessment data
# - Natanson et al. (2006): North Atlantic age and growth study
# - Ribot-Carballal et al. (2005): Northeast Pacific growth parameters
# - Cerna & Licandeo (2009): Southeast Pacific population study
# - Rolim et al. (2020): Southwest Atlantic age-length relationships
# - Kohler et al. (1995): Length-weight relationship coefficients
# Length-Weight Conversion: W(kg) = 4.4e-6 * L(cm)^3.14 (Kohler et al. 1995)
# Temperature Assignment: Mean annual SST from NOAA OISST for capture regions
# Data Format: Age-at-capture from vertebral band counts
# Eastern North Atlantic - ICCAT data (cooler waters)
# Western South Atlantic - Rolim et al. (2020) warm waters
# Northeast Pacific - Ribot-Carballal et al. (2005) cool upwelling
# Southeast Pacific - Cerna & Licandeo (2009) coldest region
